constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作次数限制，即“Roll”和“Withdraw”按钮的总操作次数有限制。

constraints.name: increment_bound
constraints.description: 每次“Roll”操作增加的数值有一个上限。

constraints.name: rounding_up
constraints.description: 在“Withdraw”操作时，当前计数器的值会被向上取整。

constraints.name: reset_after_withdraw
constraints.description: 每次“Withdraw”操作后，计数器重置为0。
